body_html: Diagflat in numpy is actually the "diag" operation here, (which diagflat doesn't make sense to me either). Having diag_part might be confusing to numpy users. I thought of using ExtractDiag for this commit and CreateDiag for the existing "diag" operation, but not sure if you wanted names that long.
body_text: Diagflat in numpy is actually the "diag" operation here, (which diagflat doesn't make sense to me either).  Having diag_part might be confusing to numpy users.  I thought of using ExtractDiag for this commit and CreateDiag for the existing "diag" operation, but not sure if you wanted names that long.
body: Diagflat in numpy is actually the "diag" operation here, (which diagflat doesn't make sense to me either).  Having diag_part might be confusing to numpy users.  I thought of using ExtractDiag for this commit and CreateDiag for the existing "diag" operation, but not sure if you wanted names that long.
